name: Temporal Crisis
description:
Prototype of a Time Crisis copy made in 5 days (August 5th, 2022 - August 9th, 2022.

Only 1 Level.

No visible guns, just imagine people having guns please! 

Humanoid model was a Captain America model from Gabe 3D. https://geibu3d.itch.io/

I edited, rigged, and retextured it. 

Bushes are from here:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/plants/yughues-free-bushes-1...

Bugs:

-Sometimes you can't shoot the last guy

-Player gun doesn't stop shooting (fixed)

Issues:

-Cannot run backwards which is problematic for some gameplay
